lead_paragraph: The road cycling world championships in 2018 will be held in the Austrian city of Innsbruck, the sport's governing body (UCI) said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Innsbruck to Host 2018 Road World Championships
headline.main: Innsbruck to Host 2018 Road World Championships
